SELECT pt.price, pt.status, pt.pitch_id as pitchId, pt.time_slot_id as timeSlotId, t.start_time as startTime, t.end_time as endTime, p.name, p.address, pt1.name as name_pitch FROM pitch_time pt join time_slot t on t.id = pt.time_slot_id join pitch p on p.id = pt.pitch_id join pitch_type pt1 on p.pitch_type_id = pt1.id where pitch_id = #{pitch_id} and start_time >=now() and status = 'ranh';
